achievements.name: EXO Dynamics Training Seal of Approval
achievements.description: Complete the training missions.

achievements.name: Up By the Roots
achievements.description: Dig up a hazard.

achievements.name: Pursuit of Knowledge
achievements.description: Research an item in the Research Chamber.

achievements.name: A Little Byte Goes a Long Way
achievements.description: Scan a Research Sample of any type.

achievements.name: Dirt Don't Hurt
achievements.description: Extract a resource using the Soil Centrifuge.

achievements.name: Do Science To It
achievements.description: Synthesize a composite material with the Chemistry Lab.

achievements.name: A Little Gassy
achievements.description: Collect a gas with the Atmospheric Condenser.

achievements.name: Sweet New Ride
achievements.description: Build a rover of any type.

achievements.name: Scrap for the Scrapper
achievements.description: Scrap an object in a Shredder.

achievements.name: Junk Trader
achievements.description: Use the Trade Platform to exchange Scrap for another resource.

achievements.name: Barrier Buster
achievements.description: Use a drill to deform a harder type of terrain.

achievements.name: Delve Greedily and Deep
achievements.description: Travel to the Mantle depth of any planet.

achievements.name: Making a New Friend
achievements.description: Plant a seed.

achievements.name: Well Hello There, Fancypants
achievements.description: Change into a different suit.

achievements.name: Thank You For Your Continued Assistance
achievements.description: Solve an EXO Dynamics Research Aid.

achievements.name: Lab Rat
achievements.description: Use the Chemistry Lab to synthesize each composite material.

achievements.name: Gas Giant
achievements.description: Use the Atmospheric Condenser to collect every type of gas.

achievements.name: Chop Shop
achievements.description: Scrap 50 objects in a Shredder.

achievements.name: In An Astroneer's Garden
achievements.description: Plant a Spinelily, Lashleaf, Bouncevine, Wheezeweed, Thistlewhip, Popcoral and Daggeroot seed.

achievements.name: Resources in the Rough
achievements.description: Use the Terrain Tool to harvest every type of raw material.

achievements.name: They Who Smelt It
achievements.description: Use the Smelter to craft every type of refined resource.

achievements.name: Research Scientist
achievements.description: Gain 100,000 Bytes across all games.

achievements.name: Information Dump
achievements.description: Reach more than 150 Bytes-Per-Minute of concurrent research.

achievements.name: First Step Into a Larger World
Blast Off
achievements.description: Use a shuttle to leave Sylva.

achievements.name: One Small Step
achievements.description: Visit Desolo.

achievements.name: It's a Dry Heat
achievements.description: Visit Calidor.

achievements.name: Into the Woods
achievements.description: Visit Vesania.

achievements.name: To the Forest Moon
achievements.description: Visit Novus.

achievements.name: I Feel Sick
achievements.description: Visit Atrox.

achievements.name: Cool As Ice
achievements.description: Visit Glacio.

achievements.name: Hang 10-Squared
achievements.description: Slide uninterrupted for at least 10 seconds.

achievements.name: Where We're Going, We Don't Need Roads
achievements.description: Drive an airborne rover for at least 10 seconds.

achievements.name: Galactic Boogaloo
achievements.description: Dance on every planet.

achievements.name: Baby You're a Firework
achievements.description: Launch 10 fireworks in 10 seconds.

achievements.name: EXO Dynamics Outreach Participant
achievements.description: Join or host a multiplayer game session.

achievements.name: Let Me Borrow This Just A Second
achievements.description: Use a Research Chamber to research something in another Astroneer's game.

achievements.name: Journey to the Center of the Thing
achievements.description: Travel to the center of any planet in a multiplayer game.

achievements.name: EXO Dynamics Outreach Advocate
achievements.description: Spend more than 4 total hours in multiplayer sessions.

achievements.name: Interplanetary Road Trip
achievements.description: Travel to another planet with another player in the same shuttle.

achievements.name: EXO Dynamics Solar System Mastery
achievements.description: Obtain every Achievement in Astroneer.

achievements.name: The First Discovery
achievements.description: Use the Probe Scanner to find one of the mysterious Vintage Probes.

achievements.name: Fourteen Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
Seaside Living with an Ocean View
Settling in for the Long Haul
